channel.title: Hyperion Problem
channel.description: All fixed, thank you to everyone.

item.title: Hyperion Problem
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Thanks, post:22, topic:528740”]I believe I did a very long time ago. I’ll look up a guide and see what I can do. I’ll tell you the results in a bit.

Edit: Now we are back to it not being able to find the path specified lol.[/quote]
Then make sure the Environmental Variables are set to the same JDK/JRE you have…

item.title: Hyperion Problem
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Thanks:

It says that it cannot find the path specified. I know that’s my jdk, but yeah it didn’t compile it.

Try:

@echo off
javac -cp bin;lib/*; -d bin src\org\hyperion\*.java src\org\hyperion\cache\util\*.java src\org\hyperion\cache\map\*.java src\org\hyperion\cache\index\*.java src\org\hyperion\cache\index\impl\*.java src\org\hyperion\cache\obj\*.java src\org\hyperion\cache\*.java src\org\hyperion\fileserver\*.java src\org\hyperion\data\*.java src\org\hyperion\ls\*.java src\org\hyperion\util\*.java src\org\hyperion\util\login\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\*.java
src\org\hyperion\rs2\task\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\task\impl\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\packet\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\region\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\npc\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\npc\fightcaves\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\npc\pestcontrol\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\npc\barrows\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\container\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\container\impl\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\event\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\event\impl\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\action\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\action\impl\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\util\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\pf\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\net\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\net\ondemand\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\login\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\quest\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\quest\impl\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\traveling\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\skills\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\skills\agility\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\skills\agility\impl\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\skills\farming\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\skills\magic\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\skills\magic\impl\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\skills\magic\impl\lunar\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\skills\magic\impl\ancient\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\skills\magic\impl\modern\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\skills\construction\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\minigames\*.java
pause

item.title: Hyperion Problem
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Thanks, post:16, topic:528740”]Well I just ran into another problem lol. Sorry.

It seems I can’t full on run it because of an anti-leech that I already fixed. I can’t compile due to that xstream problem lol.
You wouldn’t happen to have a fix on that do you sorry :palm:
Compiler:

@echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp bin;lib/jython.jar;lib/junit-2.6.jar;lib/commons-compress-1.0.jar;lib/mina-core-2.0.0-M6.jar;lib/slf4j-api-1.5.8.jar;lib/slf4j-jdk14-1.5.8.jar;lib/xpp3-1,1.4c.jar;lib/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\minigames\*.java pause [/quote]

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp bin;lib/*; -d bin src\org\hyperion\*.java src\org\hyperion\cache\util\*.java src\org\hyperion\cache\map\*.java src\org\hyperion\cache\index\*.java src\org\hyperion\cache\index\impl\*.java src\org\hyperion\cache\obj\*.java src\org\hyperion\cache\*.java src\org\hyperion\fileserver\*.java src\org\hyperion\data\*.java src\org\hyperion\ls\*.java src\org\hyperion\util\*.java src\org\hyperion\util\login\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\*.java

item.title: Hyperion Problem
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Thanks, post:14, topic:528740”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=647495.msg4354855#msg4354855 date=1377308216]

Did you mean the run code?

@echo off
java -Xms512m -Xmx1024m -cp bin;lib/jython.jar;lib/slf4j-api-1.5.8.jar;lib/mina-core-2.0.0-M6.jar;lib/slf4j-jdk14-1.5.8.jar;lib/commons-compress-1.0.jar;lib/junit-4.6.jar;lib/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;lib/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar org.hyperion.Server
pause

Check out my edit.
[/quote]

Yeah thank you so much, its working.[/quote]
Give 100% credits to AtomicInt_, not me ;). He helped me fix the error when I had it.

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion Problem
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Can you please post the code instead of taking an image? I cba to write it again.

EDIT: Nvm, I did it anyways. Use this and it should work 100%:

@echo off
java -cp bin;lib/*; org.hyperion.Server
pause

Read full topic
